subject: Prices (Fares, Fees and Rates)
Baseball
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: The best seats in the new Yankee stadium will start at $500 each and the tip-top ones — the $2,500, front-row seats — are sold out.
snippet: The best seats in the new Yankee stadium will start at $500 each and the tip-top ones — the $2,500, front-row seats — are sold out.
